Domstal Baby Drops or Domstal syrup

We had visited Dr Shreenath sir for the regular check up of baby there we informed Dr about the medicine and the quantity of the medicine which baby is currently taking.(As we had visited Neurologist recently and  Neurologist Dr had suggested 2 additional medicine which Dr Shreenath was not aware)

Our Neurologist had suggested Domstal syrup 0.8 ml thrice a day for the baby but our chemist had given Domstal Baby Drops instead of 
Domstal syrup (Generally he doesn't do this kind of mistake but it happen) and we where not aware that Domstal drop and Domstal syrup both are different...

Thanks to Dr Shreenath who explains us that there is huge difference between both and this he the most common issue he has observed..( might be parents get confuse because of similar name or we as a parent are not aware that other composition with similar name exist with a huge difference)

I request other parents too just check the composition and make sure we are not giving high dose medicine too the baby because of similar name which can cause huge side effects to baby....

Once again thank to Dr Shreenath for making us aware of this kind of issue..
